name: B the Bullet!
description:
(Made for the Weekly Game Jam 25)

Welcome to the fast-paced reflective world of B the Bullet!

Click anywhere to charge in that direction. Repel off the walls to move around the level! Make sure to keep moving too, or else you'll die!

The red guys will try to kill you by arming the walls, which turns them red, so that you'll die if you land on them.

The green guys try to help you by turning them green. Be careful though, hitting one of your allies will make them betray you and change sides!

How long can you survive I wonder?
